required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Program Extension of Real Life Dosing of Remicade in Austria for Crohn's Disease (Study P04052)(COMPLETED)
clinical_study.official_title: Real Life Dosing Regimen of Remicade in Austria in Crohn's Disease - Program Extension

brief_summary.textblock: The current observational program was determined to collect data on the real life dosing regimen of Remicade in patients with Crohn's disease (CD) in the hospital and non-hospital setting.

detailed_description.textblock: This study population was chosen from a non-probability sample

primary_outcome.measure: Mean Interval Between Infliximab Infusions Within the Observation Period (Maintenance Therapy)
primary_outcome.description: Participants received infliximab infusions with or without induction therapy. The induction therapy consisted of three infliximab infusions at Weeks 0, 2 and 6. Maintenance therapy consisted of an additional 6 infusions (maximum) as prescribed by the treating physician (dose and infusion interval).

primary_outcome.measure: Median Interval Between Infliximab Infusions Within the Observation Period (Maintenance Therapy)
primary_outcome.description: Participants received infliximab infusions with or without induction therapy. The induction therapy consisted of three infliximab infusions at Weeks 0, 2 and 6. Maintenance therapy consisted of an additional 6 infusions (maximum) as prescribed by the treating physician (dose and infusion interval).

primary_outcome.measure: Average Dose of Infliximab Per Participant Within the Observation Period
primary_outcome.description: Participants received infliximab infusions with or without induction therapy. The induction therapy consisted of three infliximab infusions at Weeks 0, 2 and 6. Maintenance therapy consisted of an additional 6 infusions (maximum) as prescribed by the treating physician (dose and infusion interval).

primary_outcome.measure: Median Dose of Infliximab Per Participant Within the Observation Period
primary_outcome.description: Participants received infliximab infusions with or without induction therapy. The induction therapy consisted of three infliximab infusions at Weeks 0, 2 and 6. Maintenance therapy consisted of an additional 6 infusions (maximum) as prescribed by the treating physician (dose and infusion interval).

primary_outcome.measure: Total Dose of Infliximab Per Participant Within the Observation Period
primary_outcome.description: Participants received infliximab infusions with or without induction therapy. The induction therapy consisted of three infliximab infusions at Weeks 0, 2 and 6. Maintenance therapy consisted of an additional 6 infusions (maximum) as prescribed by the treating physician (dose and infusion interval).

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of the Disease Activity Before Treatment and During Therapy With Remicade Via Harvey Bradshaw Index (HBI) in an Extended Patient Group of 200 Patients.
secondary_outcome.description: HBI consists of only clinical parameters (general well-being, abdominal pain, number of liquid stools per day, abdominal mass, and complications). HBI is a score on a scale; <5 (remission), 5-7 (mild disease), 8-16 (moderate disease), >16 (severe disease).

arm_group.description: Subjects with active luminal and/or fistulizing CD in the hospital or non-hospital setting.

study_pop.textblock: Subjects with active luminal and/or fistulizing CD who are treated with Remicade in the hospital and non-hospital setting.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Subjects with active luminal and/or fistulizing CD.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Per summary of product characteristics.

group.title: Remicade
group.description: Subjects with active luminal and/or fistulizing Crohn's Disease in the hospital or non-hospital setting.

drop_withdraw_reason.title: No documentation for end of therapy

group.title: Remicade
group.description: Subjects with active luminal and/or fistulizing Crohn's Disease in the hospital or non-hospital setting who received at least one infliximab infusion.

outcome.title: Mean Interval Between Infliximab Infusions Within the Observation Period (Maintenance Therapy)
outcome.description: Participants received infliximab infusions with or without induction therapy. The induction therapy consisted of three infliximab infusions at Weeks 0, 2 and 6. Maintenance therapy consisted of an additional 6 infusions (maximum) as prescribed by the treating physician (dose and infusion interval).

outcome.title: Assessment of the Disease Activity Before Treatment and During Therapy With Remicade Via Harvey Bradshaw Index (HBI) in an Extended Patient Group of 200 Patients.
outcome.description: HBI consists of only clinical parameters (general well-being, abdominal pain, number of liquid stools per day, abdominal mass, and complications). HBI is a score on a scale; <5 (remission), 5-7 (mild disease), 8-16 (moderate disease), >16 (severe disease).
outcome.population: 207 participants had disease activity analyzed using Harvey-Bradshaw Index (HBI)

outcome.title: Total Dose of Infliximab Per Participant Within the Observation Period
outcome.description: Participants received infliximab infusions with or without induction therapy. The induction therapy consisted of three infliximab infusions at Weeks 0, 2 and 6. Maintenance therapy consisted of an additional 6 infusions (maximum) as prescribed by the treating physician (dose and infusion interval).
outcome.population: 315 of infliximab-naive participants were treated in the active phase of the study. Of these, 191 participants received induction therapy (Weeks 0, 2, and 6); 27 received only induction therapy, 132 received induction therapy and subsequent maintenance therapy, and 32 received induction therapy and subsequent episodic therapy.

group.description: Subjects with active luminal and/or fistulizing Crohn's Disease in the hospital or non-hospital setting.

measure.population: 315 of infliximab-naive participants were treated in the active phase of the study. category.title: Neoplasms benign, malignant and unspecified (incl cysts and polyps)

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: There is NOT an agreement between Principal Investigators and the Sponsor (or its agents) that restricts the PI's rights to discuss or publish trial results after the trial is completed.
